trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> methods to provide access to input parameters that are passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs 類別用來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>方法，以提供傳遞給的輸入參數的存取權<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: These parameters are accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數用來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event, you can examine and manipulate the values of the parameters and perform any additional preprocessing that is required.
trans-unit.target: 藉由新增委派以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>的事件，您可以檢查和操作參數的值並執行任何其他前置處理所需。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個字典中參數的任何變更會影響作業呼叫的方法多載。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is set, you can only modify the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項設定時，您只能修改資料物件屬性，此字典中的項目; 您無法加入或移除參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項不僅會公開許多您可以控制它們來使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯<xref:System.EventArgs>類別和事件處理常式委派。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|`EventArgs` class|EventHandler delegate| |-----------|-----------------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |`EventArgs`類別 |事件處理常式委派 | |-----------|-----------------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: 只有在建立商務物件的執行個體之前立即發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: 在建立商務物件的執行個體之後，就會發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前擷取的資料。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: 發生之前插入、 更新或刪除作業會執行。 |ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之後擷取的資料。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: 發生之後插入、 更新或刪除作業已完成。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: 在商務物件被終結之前發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified input parameters collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs"></xref>類別使用指定的輸入的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects that represent the names of the parameters of the business object method and their associated values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>代表商務物件方法和其關聯的值的參數名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含商務物件方法參數及其值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Parameters can be passed to the business object method by reference or by value.
trans-unit.target: 依參考或值參數可以傳遞至商務物件方法。

trans-unit.source: If you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler> object to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting> events, you can access and manipulate these parameters using the InputParameters property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>物件，以便處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Updating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Inserting>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting>事件，您可以存取及管理這些參數，使用這屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Updating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個字典中參數的任何變更會影響作業呼叫的方法多載。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is set, you can modify only the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項設定時，您可以修改只的項目，此字典中的資料物件屬性; 您無法加入或移除參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Parameters that are passed by reference are returned in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳址方式傳遞的參數中傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>代表商務物件方法參數與對應值的名稱/值組。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
